channel.title: NameQuick Updates
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 1.9.12
item.description:
NameQuick v1.9.12

Whatâ€™s New

âš¡ Faster Processing

NameQuick now processes multiple files at once, making batch operations 2-5x faster. The app automatically adjusts speed based on your AI provider to prevent hitting rate limits.

ğŸ“Š Unified Menu Bar

Weâ€™ve consolidated the menu bar into a single, smarter icon that shows: - Live processing progress - Queue status with file count - Recent files with success indicators - Quick access to pause/resume controls

ğŸ¯ Smarter Performance

  • Intelligent Caching: Recently processed files are cached for instant results
  • Pre-loading: Files load in the background while others process
  • Memory Management: Automatic optimization to keep your Mac running smoothly

Improvements

UI Enhancements

  • New processing status icon that animates during operations
  • Cleaner menu bar without duplicate icons
  • Raycast-inspired micro-interactions throughout the app
  • Smoother hover states and transitions

Settings

  • New â€œEnable Parallel Processingâ€ toggle in Settings â†’ General
  • Better organized AI provider settings
  • Clearer error messages for rate limits

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed menu bar showing duplicate icons
  • Resolved processing queue race conditions
  • Corrected various UI responsiveness issues
  • Fixed compilation errors with Swift concurrency

Tips

  • Enable parallel processing in Settings for maximum speed
  • The new menu bar icon shows live progressâ€”no need to open the main window
  • Cached results make re-processing the same files nearly instant

Note: Parallel processing is off by default for existing users. Turn it on in Settings â†’ General â†’ AI Behavior.
